welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vernouillet, a charming city known for its quaint streets, historic landmarks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals serving various airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or have time limits.
